description.displayText: Neveen has been a total life saver for our family. She's essentially a Mary Poppins! As a working mom of two young children (ages 1 and 3) - I have little spare time to think of ways to make our days more streamlined and Neveen has somehow magically improved many inefficiencies in our home. She draws on her diverse professional background to offer and implement great ideas in regards to raising our kids. My kids thrive in her presence and I am completely at ease when she is with them, which is the most important thing. Neveen is a total package gem and I hope it comes across that I am shouting a "5 star +" review.

description.displayText:
Neveen is not only the kindest, loveliest, most responsible, trustworthy person --- she's INCREDIBLE with our 2.5 year old Sheldon. He's also asking "where's Veen?" on the days she's not with him. My husband and I are in awe of the way she teaches him, sets boundaries and stays active. She is a natural caretaker and educator. We learn valuable parenting skills from from her! 

She's been with our family for over 1 .5 years and plan on keeping her forever. We highly recommend Neveen and are happy to provide a reference.

description.displayText: Hiring Neveen was the best thing my husband and I have done so far while raising our 2 year old. We were a bit nervous to hire outside help but the second we met Neveen, our hearts were at peace.  Neveen is full of unconditional love and right away our son was comfortable with her. We have deep trust for Neveen and anyone who hires Neveen is extremely lucky!

description.displayText: Neveen was the best caregiver we hired. I would definitely hire her again. She was excellent with our 2 small children.
description.originalText: Neveen was the best caregiver we hired. I would definitely hire her again. She was excellent with our 2 small children.

description.displayText:
We hired Neveen from when our twin girls were 3 months old until last month when we left NYC for the winter. Our girls are now 2.5 years old and we have been thrilled to have Neveen  in our lives over the past few years. 

Neveen is an exceptional Nanny. The best we have had by a mile. 

Neveen gives absolute and complete attention to our girls when she is with them and is totally devoted to their happiness and education. She is a reliable, kindhearted, warm, generous woman who always goes above and beyond. If she sees a need she fills it. 

She had no problem juggling the physical and emotional needs of our girls when they were little babies and well into toddler hood. And over the pandemic she was meticulous in managing best practices. She was incredibly thorough with hand washing and sanitizing of both herself and our girls, wore a mask indoors at all times and was incredibly transparent and comfortable to communicate with. 

I wholeheartedly recommend Neveen.

description.displayText: Naveen was exceptional, my daughter loved her!
description.originalText: Naveen was exceptional, my daughter loved her!

description.displayText: If the art of child caring was tennis, Neveen would be both the Williams sisters rolled into one. If child caring was painting, Neveen is Picasso. If Neveen were a star of 90s-00s situational comedy, she's Courtenay Cox plus Sarah Jessica Parker plus Julia Louis-Dreyfus. She's the most thoughtful, caring, capable, professional, hardworking and fun person you could hope your kid to have caring for them. In a world of under-livery, Neveen over-delivers. She is exceedingly competent and kind, completely trustworthy, scrupulously honest and emotionally generous. We have been immensely lucky to have Neveen care for our twin daughters since they were days old. They adore her, we adore her, and we count her as a real friend too. She has our absolute and unreserved recommendation.
